title: Yedho Aaghudae Lyrics Mambattiyan Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Kannil un kannil kadhal anjal
nenjil un nenjil kanavin oonjal
kaalam pooravum vazhanum needhaama..

Kayin un kayil vazhayal konja
Kaalil un kaalil kolusin kenjal
unnai un maaman konjanum nee vaama ...

Yedho aaghudhe,
en nenjukul edho aaghudhe unnaal thaane
Yellam marudhe
en vahkayil, ellaam maarudhe unnaae thaane

Idhuvrai illaadha mayakam ondru
idaiveli ilaamal miratudhu indru.. yen yen edhanaale ..

Idhuvarai sollaadha thayakam ondru
Mugavari sollaamal thavikkudhu indru
Unnaal unnaal unnaal thannaale ......(Kannil un kannil ...)

Yedho aaghudhe,
en nenjukul edho aaghudhe unnaal thaane

Mudhal murai nee paartha paarvai adhu
dhinam dhinam ennodu vazhkindradhu, anbe... oh anbe..
Mudhal mudhal nee sonna varthai adhu
uryirukkul eppodhum ketkindradhe ...
Idhuvarai kaanaadha kirakkam ondru
Thalai mudhal adivarai kolludhu indru ..
Inbam thunbam rendum unnaale .........(Yedho aaghudhe ..)

Idhuvrai illaadha mayakam ondru
idaiveli ilaamal miratudhu indru.. yen yen edhanaale ..

Idhuvarai sollaadha thayakam ondru
Mugavari sollaamal thavikkudhu indru
Unnaal unnaal unnaal thannaale

Kannil un kannil kadhal anjal
nenjil un nenjil kanavin oonjal
kaalam pooravum vazhanum needhaama..

Kayin un kayil vazhayal konja
Kaalil un kaalil kolusin kenjal
unnai un maaman konjanum nee vaama ...

seo.title: Yedho Aaghudae Lyrics Mambattiyan Songs Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Yedho Aaghudae Lyrics Mambattiyan Songs Lyrics from Mambattiyan. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Thaman S and sung by Rita. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Mambattiyan, Thaman S, Rita, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
